text: Falsamblesthis pilula is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Galileo and Martins in 1987. It is known from Colombia.BioLib.cz - Falsamblesthis pilula. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Forsteriini Category:Beetles described in 1987
title: Falsamblesthis pilula
